thread.title: BRIEF-Konica Minolta's Sales For Year Ending March 2019 Will Likely Rise 9 Percent - Nikkei

title: BRIEF-Konica Minolta's Sales For Year Ending March 2019 Will Likely Rise 9 Percent - Nikkei
text:
April 20, 2018 / 7:24 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Konica Minolta's Sales For Year Ending March 2019 Will Likely Rise 9 Percent - Nikkei Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 21 (Reuters) - Nikkei: 
* KONICA MINOLTAâ€™S OPERATING PROFIT IS EXPECTED TO CLIMB ABOUT 20 PERCENT TO A LITTLE OVER 60 BILLION YEN THIS FISCAL YEAR - NIKKEI 
* KONICA MINOLTA'S SALES FOR YEAR ENDING MARCH 2019 WILL LIKELY RISE 9 PERCENT TO NEARLY 1.1 TRILLION YEN- NIKKEI Source text : [ID: s.nikkei.com/2F42iql ] Further company coverage:
